DOC.brief_summary: The current study is a dubble-blinde placebo-controlled cross-over study verifying the preventive effect of antioxidants on noise-induced hearing loss (NIHL) and noise-induced tinnitus (NIT). The antioxidants comprise of a mixture of magnesium and n-acetylcystein which should be taken 1h before leisure noise above 100dB for at least 30 minutes.
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of Noise-induced Damage by Use of Antioxidants
DOC.criteria: Age: 1825 years old Temporary tinnitus after noise exposure: loudness >5 on a VAS middle ear problems Allergy for magnesium or nacetylcystein Use of hearing protection when going out
